segments.text: This entire kitchen scene is quite frankly a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely oblivious to her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing and she's just polishing a plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, creating a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are clearly up to no good, risking a serious fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is practically begging to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's maddening to watch these preventable accidents unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children should be told to get down from there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of negligence is just infuriating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these problems could be solved with a little bit of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe this is happening right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for broken dishes and bruised bodies is enormous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR
